long_description: This Knog Blinder 4 front bike light delivers bright, waterproof performance to alert others to your presence when you're out riding. 4 super-bright, high-powered white LEDs offer excellent visibility; light output can reach as high as 80 lumens and can be seen as far away as 2,625 feet (800 meters). Lens is designed to provide a balance between beam width and distance, optimizing visibility. 5 different lighting modes to suit your needs: steady, fast flash, organic flash slow, organic flash fast and eco-flash. Lasts up to 3 hours in steady mode, 4 - 5 hours in fast flash, organic flash slow or organic flash fast modes and up to 50 hours in eco-flash mode. Recharge the lithium-ion polymer battery via integrated USB plug; fold-out USB plug is waterproof and will not be damaged by exposure to the elements. Anodized aluminum face and rugged, flexible silicone body stand up to hard use. Tool-free attachment stretches and secures with metal clip around handlebars and frame tubes with diameters of 22 - 32 mm. The Knog Blinder 4 front bike light is IP66 Tested and 100% waterproof.
